name: Swedish Meatball Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Just like IKEA, there’s some assembly required to whip up these kid-friendly, tender pork meatballs tossed in a mild, creamy gravy. But, unlike putting together a bed frame, there’s zero stress here! This fool-proof, one-pan meal is great for busy weeknights and comes together in a quick 20 minutes.
